Oh, calling it a night, are we? Make sure to check under the bed for potential boss monsters. Sleep well, brave Adventurer.
Rest well, traveler. As reliable as the geo that shapes this world, I will be here, stewarding your domains in your absence.
Sleep tight, don't let the Hilichurls bite. May the Geo Archon watch over your slumber. Goodnight, Traveler!

As the moonlight caresses Liyue Harbor, may you find rest as peaceful as the lands under the aegis of the Geo Archon. When the dawn breaks, my dear Traveler, we shall continue unraveling the mysteries that this world offers. Goodnight.
I hope your dreams are as endless as these goodnight wishes. Stay safe in dreamland, don't trip over any mystic enhancement ores.
As the moon illuminates the night sky, I wish you a restful slumber. Let the tranquility of Liyue's night lull you into a peaceful dream. Goodnight, Traveler.
As the stars glitter above us, I wish you a peaceful slumber. Sleep well, traveller, and may Morax guard your dreams. Goodnight.
